1011000010001111 0000011010000111 1 -> sum: 1011011100010111, cout: 0
0100001001110100 1110111101101000 0 -> sum: 0011000111011100, cout: 1

0011100000101011 1100101100010101 1 -> sum: 0000001101000001, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
